name: homefax
description: CarFax for Homes - Comprehensive property intelligence platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'Database setup: psql -U postgres -d homefax -f server/db/schema.sql && psql -U postgres -d homefax -f server/db/seed.sql'

author: HomeFax Team
